name: Tribe
description: $TRIBE is a DeFi-native token built to incentivize liquidity providers with high-yield rewards while maintaining a strong correlation with the asset it is paired with - $EQUAL, the native token of Equalizer. By strategically pairing $TRIBE with $EQUAL, We aim to reduce the volatility risk that often leads to impermanent loss, ensuring a more sustainable and rewarding experience for liquidity providers.
